page.title: 02Inhabitants of Rhenigidale.
page.content: Everyone here is related to each other! Maybe a while ago (when there were more people) not everyone would be related to each other but now there are only 12 people in the village and everyone is related. The oldest inhabitant is Mrs Marion Mackay. She lives at {Burnside}with her son, Mr Kenneth Mackay (the postman), his wife Moira (the teacher) and their three year old son, Duncan. Mrs Mackay's daughter Catherine lives at {Sith {Phort} with her husband, Alasdair Mackay and two children Marianne (14) and Fiona (10). Mrs Marion Mackay's brother, Roderick MacInnes lives at Salacha and her sister in law, Mrs Marion MacInnes lives at{Tigh na Mara} with her daughter Katie MacInnes and granddaughter Lorna MacInnes(16). Marianne is at school in Tarbert,Lorna at Stornoway and Fiona at Rhenigidale.
